string.text: Strelok, so you come to the barrier. Do not try to relax yet. We are happy to accept any help.
Strelok, come to us for the plan, and further instructions.
Strelok, come back and cover the position.
If you spend a night in the village tower you can be sure that something will happen.
Remember what I say, 'mistakes here don't happen twice'.
Strelok be careful. They say the village has a new anomaly. It moves around very quickly and it is not very visible.
Caution everyone, clear your brains and listen up, the passage to Radar has a guard detachment from 'Monolith'. I think you know who they are going to be shooting at. Good luck!
In the attack guys, kill all the lawyers too.
Our task is done. Go back to the farm and settle there.
Go ahead guys. The path is clear.
Strelok, be careful or you will get a bullet in the head.
